sub_title: Manager IT/ SAP at NN Group| Executive MBA
summary:
An experienced IT, Program, Project and Change Manager, specialized in complex environments that include ERP, CRM, BI and e-commerce systems. Worked within a wide variety of businesses and a solid background in IT, process modeling and business engineering.

Personality and Skills
• An open, honest and hard working person with a real can-do mentality.
• Driven to create structure and insight in complex matters and organizations.
• Excellent skills in leading large departments and programs (strategical, managerial and budgetary).
• Excellent communication skills; written and verbal skills (English and Dutch).
• Strong interpersonal skills with ability to work effectively within a wide variety of disciplines.
• Experienced in building bridges between business (requirements) and IT (solutions).
• Strong focus on improving and digitalizing businesses.
• Excellent knowledge of implementations and usage of a large IT systems, e.g. ERP, CRM, BI, Customer Service, E-commerce.

Knowledge areas
IT Management, Program Management, Project Management, Project Control, PMO, ERP, CRM, Customer Service, E-commerce, Software Development, IT, Railway, Banking, Insurance, Hosting, Datacenters, Agile, SCRUM, Prince2, Planning, Organizational Change Management, SAP ECC, SAP C4C, SAP BW, and more...

projects.title: Amsterdam Metro North-South Line, Netherlands
projects.description: In the dutch capital Amsterdam we are constructing the Noord-Zuidlijn project, a new north-south metro line. This new metro line will form an important transport artery through the central districts to connect suburbs north of the River IJ, currently served by frequent ferries, with the Amsterdam Zuid (south) transport interchange. With this new link added to expanded InterCity services, the formerly named Zuid/WTC is well placed to serve the World Trade Centre and nearby RAI exhibition space. The route is 9.8km long, of which a total of 6km will be underground.

projects.title: EvoSwitch Hall 6
projects.description:
EvoSwitch, a leading provider of sustainable and innovative carrier-neutral datacenter services, has announced the opening of Hall 6 at its Amsterdam-Haarlem campus site. The expansion will cater to increased demand from its customers, a mix of local and international ICT companies and corporate customers. The Hall is built using fully redundant dedicated power cooling infrastructure.

Considered one of the larger facilities in Europe, EvoSwitch’s Amsterdam-Haarlem site will now have a total capacity of 12,200m². The new Hall will provide a power capacity of at least 4MW and includes free cooling.

Founder and director DVTadvies BV and Contraa BV

projects.title: Evoswitch Netherlands Fase 4 Datahal-6
projects.description:
A 2N power distribution design provides two separate and independent sources of power (A and B) to the datacenter. With no interconnections or interdependencies, there are no single points of failure that could impact both sources. This provides a much higher level of redundancy and reliability of power within the datacenter. At any time, one side can be taken down for maintenance, testing, or due to an unexpected failure while full facility load remains supported by the other side.

2N Power Distribution 
3500kVA Transformer, GEN set, MDB, Busbar.

N+1 cooling 
PUE < 1.2

Modulair Dataxenter Concept  www.dataxenter.com

3 months Build and tested on site.

a great achievement for a small team of datacenter experts

profile_positions.description:
Ocom is Europe's leading internet services company. Ocom and its subsidiaries LeaseWeb, EvoSwitch, FiberRing and DataXenter are part of the experience of millions of internet users around the world every day. Ocom’s brands fulfill this function by offering reliable, innovative and cost effective solutions for the global transmission of sound, images, data, transactions and entertainment. Our companies currently transport 3.5 Tbps across the internet, which makes us one of the premier internet hosting providers in the world. 

As Project Controller I financially manage a wide variety of projects, from software development to the build of state of the art datacenters, starting from budget until delivery.
